remarks.format: ## Remarks 支持筛选时属性设置为值。Filtering is supported when the property is set to the value. 创建 委托时，需要标识将要处理该事件的方法。When you create an delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about event handler delegates, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从 Northwind 数据库中检索数据和筛选使用和。The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve data from the Northwind database and filter it using a and . 的随时应用执行方法中检索数据。The of the is applied anytime the method is executed to retrieve data. 在此示例中，包含一个筛选器参数，它包含在一个占位符集合。In this example, the contains a placeholder for a filter parameter, which is contained in the collection. 在事件，筛选器参数显示在控件。In the event, the filter parameter is displayed in a control.
